patterns: can you tell me about topics?
responses: We have 7 topics in this conference, Information Processing, Human-machine Interaction, Computer Science, Telecommunications - Networks, Signal Processing, Electronics, Image - Video, i can tell you more about the topic you need to know more :)
We have : Machine Learning; Fuzzy Logic and Computational intelligence; Data Mining; Information Fusion; Source Separation; Business Intelligence; Artificial intelligence .
We have : Model Driven Engineering; UX and Usability; Virtual, Mixed and Augmented Reality; Ubiquitous Computing Systems; Adaptive and Intelligent Systems;Social Networks.

patterns: tell me more informations about computer science
responses: We have : Algorithm and Theory; Programming Languages; High-performance computing; Information Systems Management; Intelligent e-Technology; Data Warehouse and Big Data; Quantum Information Science.

patterns: tell me more informations about Telecommunications - Networks?
responses: We have : Network Protocols; Wireless Sensor Networks; Networks and Cloud Computing Security; Quality of Service and Resource Management; Internet Of Things; Vehicular Applications and Inter-Networking Technologies.

We have : Signal Detection, Estimation and Restoration; Statistical Signal Processing; Design and Implementation of Signal Processing; Audio, Acoustic, Speech and Biomedical Signal; Non-Stationary, Non-linear and Non-gaussian Signal; Modeling in Signals.
We have : Electronic Integration; Circuits and Systems for Communications; Nanodevices and Nanosystems; Instrumentation Engineering; Embedded system; Automatic Control of Power Plants

We have : Image and Video Processing Technology; Compression, Coding and Implementation; Cryptology and Watermarking; Storage, Retrieval, and Authentication; ; Storage, Retrieval, and Authentication; Biomedical Image and Health; Multimedia Applications.

for Phd Student 130 Euros/425 Dinars , for Researcher 150 Euros/495 Dinars, for Industrial 200 Euros/660 Dinars, These fees include the Conference proceedings, the admission to the plenary sessions and Parallel Technical Sessions, and coffee breaks,Additional paper poster: Free,Additional regular paper (max 1 paper): 30 Euros/ 99 Dinars,Theses fees are available until 10 May 2022 at Midday. After this deadline, conference fees will increase 20%

A financial support (Up to 100 Euros/330 Dinars) is allocated for participants from developing countries and countries with poor currencies and not supported by their research structures. The IEEE SETIT 2022 Organizing Committee will examine all applications on a case-by-case basis and provide a response for the accepted requests for more information visit us on : http://www.setit.rnu.tn/registration-fees.html
You can meet the commitee by visiting this link : http://www.setit.rnu.tn/scientific-committee.html
